headline: Mama’s Creations Reports Third Quarter Fiscal 2026 Financial Results
summary: Revenues Grow 50% YoY to $47.3 Million, Driven by Double-Digit Organic Sales Momentum and Integration of Crown 1 Asset Acquisition EAST RUTHERFORD, NJ, Dec. 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mama’s Creations, Inc. (Nasdaq: MAMA), a leading national marketer and manufacturer of fresh deli prepared foods, has reported its financial results for the third quarter ended October 31, 2025. Financial Summary: Three Months EndedOctober 31, $ in millions 2025 2024 % Increase Revenues $47.3 $31.5 50.0%Gross Pro

content.title: Mama’s Creations Reports Third Quarter Fiscal 2026 Financial Results

(Nasdaq: MAMA), a leading national marketer and manufacturer of fresh deli prepared foods, has reported its financial results for the third quarter ended October 31, 2025. Financial Summary: Three Months EndedOctober 31, $ in millions 2025 2024 % Increase Revenues $47.3 $31.5 50.0%Gross Pro
